title.rendered: Sold Out – J Beauty Brush & Sponge Cleaner (Small)

content.rendered:
1. Wet the brush bristles and run over the surface of the soap to create a lather.
  2. Rinse the bristles, careful not to wet the ferrule and work the brush bristles into the textured surface of the silicone mat for a deeper clean.
  3. Gently squeeze out any excess water and repeat as necessary then leave brushes to dry flat.
